mapper.select: -- Integer scheduleid, Integer companyid, Short num select * from multitotalscore where ScheduleID = #{scheduleid} and CompanyID = #{companyid} and Num = #{num}
select * from MultiTotalScore where ScheduleID = #{mid} and CompanyID = #{cpy} and Num = #{num} order by modifyTime desc limit 1

update multitotalscore
ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FirstGoal = #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstUpodds = #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstDownodds = #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},

where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update multitotalscore set ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FirstGoal = #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstUpodds = #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstDownodds = #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ClosePan = #{closepan,jdbcType=BIT}, Zoudi = #{zoudi,jdbcType=BIT}, Goal_real = #{goalReal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds_real = #{upoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds_real = #{downoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, Num = #{num,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isStopLive = #{isstoplive,jdbcType=BIT}, StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update multitotalscore set Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal_real = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds_real = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds_real = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, modifyTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where oddsid = #{oddsid} and modifyTime < #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
